text: Addicted to Love is a 1997 American romantic comedy movie set in New York City. It is about manipulation and revenge. The movie stars Meg Ryan as Maggie and Matthew Broderick as Sam. Addicted to Love was released in May 1997. It got both good and bad reviews by critics. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1997 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Griffin Dunne
title: Addicted to Love (movie)
